title: Available for Aug - 0BR Apartment walking Distance to Harvard Square
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at (617) 272-7141 to book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Crimson Court is a contemporary building in quiet residential setting but is less than a five-minute walk to Harvard Square, Red Line and University shuttle buses.
Our apartment homes feature fully-equipped and updated kitchens with hardwood flooring in select units.
Our community features controlled access with elevators, as well as onsite laundry facilities.
Beautifully landscaped grounds with a quiet yard equipped with grill station surround the building, and invite you into an outdoor dining area.
Included in Utilities Cost: Heat/hot water
